âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Retrieval-Augmented Colorization â€¢ Three-stage diffusion-based framework
ðŸ“– Summary: ColorFlow is a retrieval-augmented image sequence colorization framework designed for industrial applications. It utilizes a three-stage diffusion-based approach with a dual-branch design to extract color identity and perform colorization. The framework introduces ColorFlow-Bench, a benchmark for reference-based colorization, and demonstrates superior performance compared to existing models.
